item.title: Daaku Maharaaj: Dabidi Dibidi dance steps become a hot topic - 123telugu
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj: Dabidi Dibidi Dance Steps Become a Hot Topic

Published on: Jan 2, 2025 10:00 pm IST

Daaku Maharaaj is set to hit the screens on January 12, 2025. Thaman has composed the music for this film, and a new song, Dabidi Dabidi, was launched today.

  • Balakrishna’s dance steps in the new song have become a talking point.
  • Choreographed by Sekhar Master, the dance features energetic mass steps.
  • Social media buzzes with clips from the song, receiving both praise and trolling.
  • Urvashi Rautela plays the female lead and is noted for her stunning appearance.
“Whatever Balayya does grabs attention, and the same holds for this song.”

The song is generating significant excitement ahead of the film's release.

item.title: Who is Sivasri Skandaprasad? Singer reportedly engaged to BJP's Tejasvi Surya - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Who is Sivasri Skandaprasad? Singer reportedly engaged to BJP's Tejasvi Surya

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Hindustan Times

Sivasri Skandaprasad, a noted classical singer recognized for her work in 'Ponniyin Selvan', has attracted attention due to her rumored engagement with BJP leader Tejasvi Surya, although neither party has confirmed the news.

  • Sivasri, born on August 1, 1996, is the daughter of Mridangam maestro Seerkazhi Sri J Skandaprasad.
  • She is both a Carnatic singer and a performing Bharatanatyam artist with multiple accolades.
  • Sivasri is a bio-engineering graduate and has a diploma in Ayurvedic cosmetology.
  • She is the founder of 'Ahuti', a platform aimed at promoting Indian art forms and inclusive education.
  • Her contribution to Carnatic music includes performances in prestigious venues and accompanied notable Bharatanatyam dancers.
  • Awarded several titles, including 'Bharata Kala Choodamani' for her significant contributions to the arts.
  • Gained recognition after Prime Minister Modi praised her rendition of a Kannada Ram bhajan.
“Dear Modi ji, Thank you so much. This is really big for a humble artiste like me. Thank you for encouraging us to constantly strive towards serving Bharat and continue our spiritual journey.”

With her multifaceted talents and contributions, Sivasri Skandaprasad continues to inspire many in the realm of Indian classical arts.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj Faces Backlash for His Dance Moves - M9
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Faces Backlash for His Dance Moves

Publication Date: Not specified Source: M9 News

The newly released song Dabidi Dibidi from Balakrishna’s upcoming film Daaku Maharaaj has sparked controversy due to its criticized dance moves.

  • The choreography by Shekhar Master has drawn significant backlash.
  • Fans feel the dance moves do not align with Balakrishna's age and stature.
  • Anti-fans and Tamil fans have amplified criticism through social media.
  • Director Bobby Kolli faces scrutiny for not aligning the choreography with Balakrishna's public image.
  • Balakrishna is recognized for choosing age-appropriate roles in his career.
  • The film is set to release on January 12 for Sankranti.
“No justification or explanation will defend the approval of such dance moves at this time.”

This backlash highlights the importance of maintaining a consistent public image, especially for prominent figures in the film industry.

item.title: Justin Baldoni's former agency refutes dropping him under Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds' pressure - Hindustan Times
item.description:
WME claims it did not drop Justin Baldoni due to Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds after Lively accused him of harassment.

January 02, 2025, Source: Hindustan Times

Justin Baldoni’s former agency, WME, insisted that they did not drop the actor and director because of Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds after Lively filed a lawsuit accusing Baldoni of sexual harassment.

  • WME states no pressure came from Lively or Reynolds when Baldoni was dropped.
  • Baldoni filed a $250 million lawsuit against The New York Times following coverage of Lively's complaint.
  • The lawsuit alleges Lively sabotaged Baldoni's role and participation in a film premiere.
  • Lively's attorney claims the lawsuit has no bearing on existing allegations against Baldoni.
WME: "This is not true. Baldoni’s former representative was not at the Deadpool & Wolverine premiere nor was there any pressure from Reynolds or Lively to drop Baldoni as a client."

The unfolding legal battle highlights ongoing tensions between the actors, as Baldoni seeks to clear his name amidst serious allegations.

item.title: Jennifer Aniston offers to help Selena Gomez in wedding planning: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Jennifer Aniston Offers Wedding Planning Help to Selena Gomez

Date: Jan 02, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

As Selena Gomez prepares for her wedding to Benny Blanco, reports suggest she is receiving support from her close friend Jennifer Aniston, who is offering her wedding planning expertise.

  • Jennifer Aniston and Selena Gomez share the same manager and have been friends since they met at a Vanity Fair event.
  • Jennifer is reportedly providing advice on navigating married life and planning celebrity weddings.
  • Sources indicate that Aniston is excited and has already sent flowers to Gomez.
  • The wedding is expected to have a significant number of celebrity guests.
“Jennifer treats Selena like a younger sister. She’s very excited for her and has already sent flowers and a card offering to help out however she can.”

In conclusion, Jennifer Aniston's support for Selena Gomez as she prepares for her wedding signifies a strong friendship and highlights the unique challenges of planning a celebrity wedding.

item.title: Check out: Third song from ‘Daaku Maharaaj’, titled ‘Dabidi Dibidi’, is out now - Telangana Today
item.description:
Check out: Third song from ‘Daaku Maharaaj’, titled ‘Dabidi Dibidi’, is out now

Published Date: 2 January 2025, Source: Telangana Today

The much-anticipated third song from ‘Daaku Maharaaj’, titled ‘Dabidi Dibidi’, has been unveiled and is creating a buzz on social media. A lavish mass dance number, it pays tribute to the legendary dialogues of Nandamuri Balakrishna.

  • Vagdevi’s vibrant vocals enhance the track.
  • The lyrics blend Balakrishna’s iconic monologues with dynamic music by S Thaman.
  • The song features high-energy performances by Balakrishna and Urvashi Rautela.
  • Rich visuals and choreography create a larger-than-life experience.
  • The film is set to release on January 12, 2025.
“Set to become the next ‘Jai Balayya’ for fans.”

‘Daaku Maharaaj’ promises a grand cinematic experience, blending action and heartfelt emotions.

item.title: Ben Affleck reaches out to hypnotist quit smoking amid divorce from Jennifer Lopez: Report - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ben Affleck Reaches Out to Hypnotist to Quit Smoking Amid Divorce from Jennifer Lopez

Publication Date: Jan 02, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Ben Affleck is reportedly seeking to quit smoking as he navigates the stress of his ongoing divorce from Jennifer Lopez. A source reveals that he has reached out to a hypnotherapist for assistance.

  • Affleck has been chain-smoking amid the stress of his divorce from Lopez.
  • He successfully quit smoking in 2005 with the help of hypnosis.
  • Photographed chain-smoking after Lopez filed for divorce.
  • Affleck is determined to begin 2025 smoke-free and has booked a hypnotherapy session.
“Ben was so happy 20 years ago when he quit. He swore he'd never go back, but here he is just as addicted as ever and desperate to stop.”

The story highlights Affleck's struggle with smoking due to stress from his divorce, emphasizing his commitment to quit again with professional help.

item.title: BREAKING! Stree 3, Bhediya 2, Thama, and other five films of Maddocks horror-comedy universe get release dates; deets inside - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
BREAKING! Stree 3, Bhediya 2, Thama, and other five films of Maddock’s horror-comedy universe get release dates; deets inside

Publication Date: Not Specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

Maddock Films, led by producer Dinesh Vijan, has announced an ambitious slate of eight theatrical releases from their highly anticipated Maddock Horror-Comedy Universe (MHCU). The lineup is set to deliver a thrilling mix of laughter, spooks, and chills from 2025 to 2028.

Key Release Dates:

  • 2025:
    • Thama: Diwali 2025
    • Shakti Shalini: December 31, 2025
  • 2026:
    • Bhediya 2: August 14, 2026
    • Chamunda: December 4, 2026
  • 2027:
    • Stree 3: August 13, 2027
    • Maha Munjya: December 24, 2027
  • 2028:
    • Pehla Mahayudh: August 11, 2028
    • Doosara Mahayudh: October 11, 2028
Dinesh Vijan's Maddock Films is carving a niche in the Indian film industry with its genre-blending horror-comedies.

This carefully curated lineup aims to enhance the cinematic experience with interconnected narratives across eight films.

item.title: ‘Rakul Preet Singh-Bhumi Pednekar will dump Arjun Kapoor and get together’: Fans guess plot of Mere Husband Ki Biwi - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Fans Speculate Romance in 'Mere Husband Ki Biwi' Starring Rakul Preet Singh and Bhumi Pednekar

Date: Jan 02, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The announcement of the film 'Mere Husband Ki Biwi' has sparked speculation among fans, predicting a romantic dynamic between Rakul Preet Singh and Bhumi Pednekar, potentially leaving Arjun Kapoor's character heartbroken.

  • The film features a unique love circle motif rather than a traditional love triangle, as depicted in its motion poster.
  • Fans are drawing comparisons to previous films and predicting plot twists centered around the two female leads.
  • Netizens are actively discussing theories about the storyline, showcasing significant engagement even before the trailer's release.
“Maybe Rakul and Bhumi are the final pairing, leaving Arjun alone,” shared one fan on social media.

The film is set to release in theaters on February 21, 2025, creating buzz surrounding its potential narrative twists.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Maddock Films set for horror comedy universe with 8 films lined up from 2025 to 2028; Shakti Shalini & Chamunda are 2 new entrants - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Maddock Films Announces Ambitious Horror Comedy Universe with 8 Films from 2025 to 2028

Publication Date: January 02, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Maddock Films is setting the stage for an interconnected horror-comedy superhero universe over the next four years, introducing eight films from 2025 to 2028, including new titles Thama, Shakti Shalini, and Chamunda.

  • 2025 will see the release of Thama on Diwali and Shakti Shalini on December 31.
  • 2026 will bring Bhediya 2 on August 14 and Chamunda on December 4.
  • 2027 will feature Stree 3 on August 13 and Mahamunjya on December 24.
  • 2028 will culminate in the releases of Pehla Mahayudh on August 11 and Doosra Mahayudh during the Diwali period on October 18.
“Our mission at Maddock has always been to innovate and entertain... a cinematic universe that brings unforgettable characters and their stories to life like never before.” - Dinesh Vijan

Maddock Films aims to reshape the future of Hindi cinema by blending heritage with innovation through its ambitious horror-comedy universe.

item.title: Marco Box Office Day 14 Prediction (Hindi): Unni Mukundan’s Film To Have Steady Growth; To Cross 5Cr Today - Filmibeat
item.description:
Marco Box Office Day 14 Prediction (Hindi): Unni Mukundan’s Film To Have Steady Growth; To Cross 5Cr Today

Published: Thursday, January 2, 2025, 18:03 [IST]

Unni Mukundan's film Marco, directed by Haneed Adeni, has gained significant attention and is expected to achieve steady growth at the box office. The film has performed well in the Hindi market despite competition.

  • Marco is an action thriller and the most violent film in Indian Cinema.
  • It opened to rave reviews in both Malayalam and Hindi markets.
  • The film recorded the highest single-day collection of Rs 1.15 crores on day 13.
  • It is projected to cross Rs 5 crores by the end of day 14.
“The Censor team has not fully cut down the violence. They have only reduced the brutality.” - Shareef Muhammed, Producer

The sustained interest and positive reception indicate that Marco is set for a successful run at the box office.

item.title: Game Changer trailer: Ram Charan pulls off multiple looks in father-son saga for righteousness. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Game Changer trailer: Ram Charan pulls off multiple looks in father-son saga for righteousness.

Date: January 02, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Director Shankar’s upcoming film Game Changer, starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, is set for theatrical release on January 10 for Sankranthi. The trailer showcases Ram in multiple roles, including an IAS officer, as a student, and a police officer.

  • The trailer was released at an event in Hyderabad attended by SS Rajamouli.
  • Ram Charan’s character faces a corrupt Chief Minister played by SJ Suryah.
  • The film includes a significant music investment, with ₹75 crore spent on four songs.
  • Production for the film faced delays but concluded in 2024.
  • Game Changer is expected to clash with other movies during the Sankranthi festival.
“So, whether Game Changer will redeem the director remains to be seen.”

The anticipation around Game Changer highlights its potential impact on the upcoming festival box office competition.

item.title: Upasana Singh was the first choice for 'Maine Pyar Kiya' opposite Salman Khan: 'Kareena, Abhishek, Hrithi - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Upasana Singh was the first choice for 'Maine Pyar Kiya' opposite Salman Khan

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Upasana Singh reveals that she was the first choice for the lead female role in the iconic movie 'Maine Pyar Kiya' opposite Bollywood superstar Salman Khan. This revelation has surprised many in the industry, including celebrities like Kareena Kapoor, Abhishek Bachchan, and Hrithik Roshan, when director Raj Kumar Barjatya announced her casting.

  • Singh was initially selected for the role in 'Maine Pyar Kiya'.
  • The announcement was surprising for several prominent actors.
  • Raj Kumar Barjatya made the casting decision public.
“Kareena, Abhishek, Hrithik were shocked when Raj Kumar Barjatya announced my casting.” - Upasana Singh

This behind-the-scenes information sheds light on the casting dynamics in Bollywood during that era and highlights Singh's place in the film's history.

item.title: Game Changer trailer: Impactful with solid visuals and Ram Charan’s mass avatar - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer trailer: Impactful with solid visuals and Ram Charan’s mass avatar

Published on Jan 2, 2025 by OTT

The day Ram Charan fans have been waiting for is finally here, as the Game Changer team launched the theatrical trailer. Directed by Shankar, this political action drama has been produced on a massive budget and is packed with solid commercial elements.

  • The trailer showcases Ram Charan in various avatars, confirming his mass appeal.
  • Shankar aims to reclaim his reputation following criticisms of previous projects.
  • The trailer hints at a strong storyline and features notable actors such as Anjali, SJ Suryah, and Srikanth.
Ram Charan seems to have got a role with multiple shades just like that of RRR.

The anticipation for Ram Charan’s performance is at an all-time high after this trailer launch.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: 'I will consciously strive to elevate the mass screen presence of Salman Khan in Sikandar,' says Santhosh Narayanan - Movie Talkies
item.description:
Santhosh Narayanan Discusses His Work on the Sikandar Teaser

Publication Date: Recent
Source: Movie Talkies

The teaser for Sikandar featuring Salman Khan was released last week, garnering an enthusiastic response for its background score composed by Santhosh Narayanan. This marks Narayanan's first Bollywood film and has been a joyous experience for him.

  • Sikandar's teaser was released on Salman Khan's birthday.
  • Santhosh Narayanan received immense appreciation for his background score.
  • Narayanan aims to enhance the mass screen presence of Salman Khan's character.
  • The film is directed by AR Murugadoss and is set for release on Eid 2025.
"I am filled with gratitude and incredibly thankful that the music is connecting with the audience. This is my first Bollywood film, and it feels like an absolute dream." - Santhosh Narayanan
"I will make a conscious effort to elevate the mass screen presence of the character played by Salman sir." - Santhosh Narayanan

The collaboration with renowned director AR Murugadoss and actor Salman Khan has been described by Narayanan as a privilege, enhancing his creative process.

item.title: Armaan Malik ties the knot with Aashna Shroff; wedding photos go viral! - The Times of India
item.description:
Armaan Malik Ties the Knot with Aashna Shroff; Wedding Photos Go Viral

Date: January 2, 2025 Source: Times of India

Singer Armaan Malik and social media influencer Aashna Shroff have officially begun their journey as a married couple. The couple recently shared their wedding photos on social media, radiating love and joy.

  • Armaan and Aashna shared stunning pictures from their wedding on Instagram, which quickly went viral.
  • The images captured heartfelt moments, including the couple exchanging vows and participating in traditional rituals.
  • Aashna wore a bright orange lehenga while Armaan complemented her with a pastel peach embroidered sherwani.
“Tu hi mera ghar,” the couple captioned their wedding post, encapsulating their love.

Armaan Malik is well known for his hit romantic ballads, showcasing his exceptional musical talent that resonates with many.

item.title: Sunday's Golden Globes to launch Hollywood's awards festivities - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sunday's Golden Globes to Launch Hollywood's Awards Festivities

Date: Jan 02, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Hollywood will kick off its 2025 awards festivities on Sunday at the annual Golden Globes ceremony, featuring competitors such as "Wicked," "The Brutalist," and "Emilia Perez".

  • Timothee Chalamet, Selena Gomez, and others compete for acting honors.
  • The ceremony will mark Nikki Glaser's debut as host.
  • Winners are chosen by 334 journalists from 85 countries.
  • Winning a Globe can boost a film's Oscar chances significantly.
  • "The Brutalist" is favored for the best film drama prize.
  • In TV categories, the most nominations go to "The Bear".
"Winning a Globe can help films in the run-up to the Academy Awards in March." – Scott Feinberg, The Hollywood Reporter

This year's Golden Globes promise a diverse lineup of nominees and could significantly influence the Oscars in March.

item.title: Hits, Misses, Super Hits, Disasters and All-Time Blockbusters: The Box Office classification and Report card of 2024 - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Hits, Misses, Super Hits, Disasters and All-Time Blockbusters: The Box Office classification and Report card of 2024

Publication Date: 2024
Source: Bollywood Hungama

The year 2024 has seen a wide range of box office performances in Bollywood, with films classified from All Time Blockbusters to Disasters based on their earnings. Notably, Munjiya stands out as a Super Hit while Bade Miyaan Chote Miyan disappoints as a Disaster.

Key Points:

  • Pushpa 2 has earned approximately Rs. 769.75 cr., making it an All Time Blockbuster.
  • Stree 2 became one of the biggest hits with Rs. 627.02 cr.
  • Munjya emerged as a sleeper hit, crossing Rs. 100 cr.
  • Bade Miyaan Chote Miyan was classified as a Disaster with earnings of only Rs. 59.17 cr.
Pushpa 2: The Rule has raked in more than any other film this year.

Overall, the classification system aids in understanding the economic landscape and viewer preferences in Bollywood.

item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Justin Baldoni accuses Ryan Reynolds of ‘berating’ him for ‘fat-shaming’ Blake Lively - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Justin Baldoni accuses Ryan Reynolds of ‘berating’ him for ‘fat-shaming’ Blake Lively

Date: January 02, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Justin Baldoni has filed a $250 million libel lawsuit against the New York Times, alleging that Ryan Reynolds berated him for fat-shaming Blake Lively.

  • Baldoni claims the incident stemmed from a reasonable inquiry about Lively's weight for a lift scene due to his back issues.
  • The confrontation with Reynolds reportedly involved aggressive accusations and forced Baldoni to apologize.
  • Following the incident, Lively refused to perform the scene, causing further complications.
Baldoni said that the situation was so aggressive he felt compelled to offer repeated apologies despite his query being reasonable.

The lawsuit highlights issues of misunderstanding and aggression in Hollywood along with the implications of body image discussions in film.

item.title: Box Office New Year Record: Aamir Khan Dominates Top 10 List, Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2 Strikes Shah Rukh Khan & Prabhas! - Koimoi
item.description:
Box Office New Year Record: Aamir Khan Dominates Top 10 List, Allu Arjun’s Pushpa 2 Strikes Shah Rukh Khan

Date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun started the new year strongly as Pushpa 2 earned 10 crore INR on its 28th day of release, making it one of the top 10 collections for a Hindi film on January 1.

  • Pushpa 2 makes 10 crore INR on January 1, 2025, ranking 8th in the top 10 first-day January box office collections.
  • Allu Arjun's film surpassed Shah Rukh Khan’s Dunki and Prabhas's Salaar, both of which had a box-office clash on December 21, 2023.
  • Aamir Khan leads the top 10 list with four films, including Dangal, PK, 3 Idiots, and Dhoom 3.
“Pushpa 2 earned 63% more than its predecessor on the same day.”

This new achievement contributes significantly to Allu Arjun's standing in the industry while Aamir Khan continues to dominate the box office rankings.

item.title: Jhanak’s return to India marks a new chapter with Vihaan and their baby - India Forums
item.description:
Jhanak’s return to India marks a new chapter with Vihaan and their baby

Published: Thursday, January 2, 2025 at 9:56 AM

The upcoming episode of Jhanak will introduce a significant leap, showcasing Jhanak as she begins a new chapter in her life with a different family after her return from America.

  • Jhanak is kidnapped by Kulbhushan and his associates.
  • She escapes but is later found unconscious in a truck.
  • The Bose family faces legal pressure over ancestral property.
  • Jhanak is welcomed into a Gujarati household as the younger daughter-in-law.
  • Vihaan, her husband, plans a visit to Kolkata to meet his childhood friend Aniruddha.
“It’s the comforting power of a mother's embrace.”

Jhanak's story evolves as she copes with her past while starting anew with her husband and child.

item.title: After Bollywood's biggest dud The Lady Killer, Arjun Kapoor and Bhumi Pednekar reunite for Mere Husband Ki Biwi - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Arjun Kapoor and Bhumi Pednekar Reunite for Mere Husband Ki Biwi

Published on: Jan 02, 2025 by: Devansh Sharma

Actors Arjun Kapoor, Bhumi Pednekar, and Rakul Preet Singh will share the screen in a film titled "Mere Husband Ki Biwi" after their previous collaboration in the poorly received film "The Lady Killer".

  • The upcoming film is set to be released on February 21, 2025.
  • A playful announcement on Instagram describes the film's love story as unique: "Yahaan pyaar ki geometry thodi twisted hai - kyunki ye love triangle nahi, pura circle hai!"
  • The film will be directed by Mudassar Aziz, known for his work on films like "Khel Khel Mein" and "Pati Patni Aur Woh".
  • The film's producers include Vashu Bhagnani, Jackky Bhagnani, and Deepshikha Deshmukh.
  • Arjun and Bhumi's last film, "The Lady Killer," was a commercial failure, earning only ₹60,000 against a budget of ₹45 crore.
“It's lighthearted, relatable, and full of moments that will stay with you long after you leave the theater,” said director Mudassar Aziz.

In summary, the reunion of Arjun Kapoor and Bhumi Pednekar aims to create a better reception from audiences, following their last film's disappointing performance.

item.title: Justin Baldoni sues Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds accusing them of sabotaging his career and excluding h - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Justin Baldoni sues Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds accusing them of sabotaging his career and excluding him from 'It Ends With Us' premiere

Publication Date: [Date not provided]
Source: [Source not provided]

Actor Justin Baldoni has filed a lawsuit against Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds, alleging that their actions have undermined his career and prevented him from participating in the premiere of the film 'It Ends With Us'.

  • Baldoni claims malicious intent behind their actions.
  • The lawsuit seeks damages for emotional distress and lost opportunities.
  • It highlights the challenges faced by actors in Hollywood.
“I can’t believe they would go this far to exclude me,” Baldoni stated.

This case sheds light on the competitive nature of the film industry and the pressure actors face.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 28: Topples Stree 2 With 233% Higher Collections To Rewrite History, Yet Again! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 28: Topples Stree 2 With 233% Higher Collections To Rewrite History, Yet Again!

Publication Date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Koimoi

The massive streak of success goes on for Pushpa 2 at the Hindi box office. Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil starrer witnessed an impressive jump on the New Year holiday. It is now inching closer to the 800 crore mark.

  • The film earned 10 crores on January 1, 2025, marking a 42% increase from the previous day.
  • Overall box office collections after 28 days stand at 792.75 crores.
  • Pushpa 2 has recorded the highest day 28 collection in Hindi cinema history, surpassing films like Stree 2, Baahubali 2, and Uri: The Surgical Strike.
  • It boasts 233% higher collections than Stree 2, the previous leader.
  • With only 7.25 crores more, it will be the first Indian film to enter the 800 crore club in the Hindi belt.
“The box office run is truly glorious.”

As the holiday season draws to a close, many anticipate how the film's journey will progress. So far, audience reception has been outstanding, with Pushpa 2 outperforming all recent Christmas releases.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Anubhav stops Rajat from seeing Savi during her critical hospitalisation - India Forums
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Identity Review | Tovino Thomas Starrer Is Expensive, Expansive and Excessively Complicated - Lensmen Reviews
item.description:
Identity Review | Expensive, Expansive and Excessively Complicated

Publication Date: January 2, 2025 | Source: Lensmen Reviews

The review discusses the latest film 'Identity', highlighting both its ambitious scope and intricate plot that tends to overcomplicate a seemingly simple story.

  • The story revolves around Haran Shankar, a character with an abusive past and unique skills as a sketch artist.
  • As Haran interacts with his police officer neighbor and a witness with face blindness, the narrative unfolds in unexpected ways.
  • The film is noted for its detailed research but suffers from excessive exposition that diminishes the impact of plot twists.
  • Director’s choices in cinematography and pacing received praise, especially during action sequences.
  • The review suggests that the film's ambitions could have benefited from a more refined screenplay.
“A bit more refinement on a writing level would have made Identity a quality film by all means.”

In conclusion, while 'Identity' showcases ambitious filmmaking and intriguing concepts, its overly complicated storyline ultimately detracts from the viewer's experience.

item.title: Arjun Kapoor, Rakul Preet Singh, Bhumi Pednekar starrer Mere Husband Ki Biwi gets its FIRST poster - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
First Poster Released for 'Mere Husband Ki Biwi'

Date: October 2023 Source: Bollywood Hungama

The excitement builds for the romantic comedy 'Mere Husband Ki Biwi,' starring Arjun Kapoor, Rakul Preet Singh, and Bhumi Pednekar, as the film reveals its first poster.

  • Arjun Kapoor returns to the romantic comedy genre after his role in 'Singham Again.'
  • The film is produced by Pooja Entertainment and directed by Mudassar Aziz.
  • The first poster has garnered attention with its unique representation of the characters' footwear.
  • The movie promises a ‘love circle’ involved with comedic relationship confusions.
  • Scheduled for release on February 21, 2025, the film aims to deliver humor and relatability.
Mudassar Aziz stated, "Mere Husband Ki Biwi is a film that celebrates the quirks and complexities of romantic relationships."

The film is expected to provide a lighthearted take on modern relationships, promising a blend of humor and heartwarming moments.
